title: It just never ends
author: VD
content_html: We’ll never stop hearing them talk about themselves until the last one dies. Satan has got to be dreading the idea of having to listen to them endlessly yammer on and on about themselves for all eternity in Hell.
content_text: We’ll never stop hearing them talk about themselves until the last one dies. Satan has got to be dreading the idea of having to listen to them endlessly yammer on and on about themselves for all eternity in Hell.
